post.author: 이성기
post.content:
Maybe you need this PDF file for self study VAJ.
1. Version 3.5 Self Study Guide: VisualAge for Java and WebSphere Studio
http://www7.software.ibm.com/vad.nsf/Data/Document4488
Building a Web Application - Enterprise JavaBeans
This presentation steps you through visually constructing both session and entity Enterprise JavaBeans™ in the VisualAge for Java, Enterprise Edition, Version 3.0 development environment.
This is one of a series of narrated ScreenCams that have been updated for VisualAge for Java, Version 3.0:
http://www7.software.ibm.com/vad.nsf/Data/Document2941?OpenDocument&p=1&BCT=1&Footer=1
post.title: VisualAge for Java 자습교재 + screen cam tutorial
